H0.text: A closed circuit is an electrical component that has a continuous path for electrons to flow.

H1.text: An open circuit is an electrical component that has a continuous path for electrons to flow.

H2.text: A filament is an electrical component that has a continuous path for electrons to flow.

H3.text: A battery is an electrical component that has a continuous path for electrons to flow.

A4.text: An electrical circuit is a network consisting of a closed loop, giving a return path for the current.

A5.text: networks without a closed loop are often referred to as open circuits
